Orr et al. (2017)	boulder	Orr2017-40	Orr2017-I	ZK17	33.9954	77.4815	4817	3	2.65	1	2880000	860000	07KNSTD	0	0	0	2014	26100	7500	-	-	34695	10679	10451	-	-	-	-

Reference:
Orr EN, Owen LA, Murari MK, Saha S, Caffee MW, 2017. The timing and extent of Quaternary glaciation of Stok, northern Zanskar Range, Transhimalaya, of northern India. Geomorphology 284, 142-155.

Data comments:
Topographic shielding factors >1 (STOK samples) inverted.
Sample density assumed to be 2.65 g/cm3.
10Be concentrations for ZK samples (apart from ZK1 and ZK3) divided by 10 based on published exposure ages.
10Be standard assumed to be 07KNSTD.
Sampling year assumed to be 2014.
Group ID based on publication.

expage.github.io - data from expage-201706
